charges.charge_description: Did transmit a threatening communication in interstate commerce

charges.charge_offence_description: Did transmit a threatening communication in inters

charges.charge_description: INTERSTATE COMMUNICATIONS - THREATS did knowingly and willfully transmit an interstate communication containing a threat to injure the person of another, that is, his estranged spouse, the sister of the defendant's estranged spouse, and the brother-in-law of the defendant's estranged spouse(6)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 18 months, with credit for time served, and is remanded to the custody of the U S Marshal. Upon release from imprisonment, defendant shall be on supervised release for 3 years with standard and special conditions. Defendant shall pay a special assessment of $100.00, due immediately

charges.charge_description: INTERSTATE DOMESTIC VIOLENCE - did travel in interstate commerce with the intent to kill, injure, harass, or intimidate his estranged spouse, and in the course of and as a result of such travel, did place his estranged spouse in reasonable fear of death or serious bodily injury(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on motion of Government during sentencing proceedings held 8/18/05

charges.charge_description: INTERSTATE DOMESTIC VIOLENCE - did travel in interstate commerce with the intent to kill, injure, harass, or intimidate the sister of the defendant's estranged spouse, and in the course of and as a result of such travel, did place the sister of the defendant's estranged spouse in reasonable fear of death or serious bodily injury(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on motion of Government during sentencing proceedings held 8/18/05

charges.charge_description: INTERSTATE DOMESTIC VIOLENCE - did travel in interstate commerce with the intent to kill, injure, harass, or intimidate the brother-in-law of the defendant's estranged spouse, and in the course of and as a result of such travel, did place the brother-in-law of the defendant's estranged spouse in reasonable fear of death or serious bodily injury(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on motion of Government during sentencing proceedings held 8/18/05

charges.charge_description: INTERSTATE COMMUNICATIONS - THREATS did knowingly and willfully transmit an interstate communication containing a threat to injure the person of another, that is, the defendant's estranged spouse(4)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on motion of Government during sentencing proceedings held 8/18/05

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on motion of Government during sentencing proceedings held 8/18/05

charges.charge_description: INTERSTATE COMMUNICATIONS - THREATS did knowingly and willfully transmit an interstate communication containing a threat to injure the person of another, that is, the brother-in-law of the defendant's estranged spouse(7)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on motion of Government during sentencing proceedings held 8/18/05
